#include<stdio.h>
void scanint(int &x){
    char c = getchar_unlocked();
    x = 0;
    while(c<'0'||c>'9'){
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9'){
        x= (x<<1)+ (x<<3) + c - '0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
}
int main(){
    int t;
    scanint(t);
    while(t--){
        int n,k;
        scanint(n);
        scanint(k);
        unsigned long long ans=n;
        ans*=n-1;
        ans=ans>>1;
        if(k!=0){
        ans -= (n-k);
        }
        printf("%llu\n",ans);
    }
}
